name: CCEAI 2018 : 2018 2nd International Conference on Control Engineering and Artificial Intelligence
content: ●Publication and Indexing 1, All the accepted papers will be included in the Journal of Physics: Conference Series (JPCS)(ISSN: 1742-6588), which will be indexed by Ei Compendex, CPCI, Scopus, INSPEC and other academical databases. ★CCEAI 2017 conference proceeding has been Indexed by Ei Compendex. 2,Selected papers with great extension will be recommended to publish in international journals.
